alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 7:06PM CDT until April 04 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR FLOYD AND NORTHWESTERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marble Rock, or 8 miles southwest of Charles City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 653 PM nickel sized hail was reported south of Dumont, Iowa. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Charles City, Nashua, Rockford, Rudd, Floyd, Marble Rock, Ionia, Chickasaw, North Washington, Colwell, Bassett, Bradford, Roseville, Oakwood, Powersville, Colwell County Park and Bunns Woods County Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
